summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to discrimination in housing and public accommodations, amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 14.08 (Open Housing Ordinance 113610), to prohibit discrimination against holders of Section 8 rent certificates, by amending SMC Sections 14.08.020, 14.08.040, 14.08.050, 14.08.060, 14.08.070, 14.08. 080, 14.08.090, and 14.080.190.
